scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run lintserver && npm run js && npm run minijs && npm run minicss
scripts.debug: npm run lint && npm run lintserver && npm run jsdebug && npm run lessdebug
scripts.clean: npm run del ./release/main.js && npm run del ./release/styles.css && npm run del ./main.js && npm run del ./styles.css
